text: eoneu nugudo hananim-ui heolag-eobs-ineun jugji anihamyeo geu gigan-eun gilogdoeeo issnola nugudeunji hyeonse-ui bosang-eul wonhaneunja issdamyeon geuege bosang-eul jul geos-iyo nugudeunji naese ui bosang-eul wonhaneunja issdamyeon geue ge bosang-eul jul geos-imyeo tto gamsahaneun jadeul-egedo bosang-eul julila
